TFT9_RyzeShadowIsles_desc:
Mark the strongest 1/1/10 ally's soul(s) to be reclaimed by the Shadow Isles. After they die, they return to the battlefield with 40/60/100% (%i:scaleAP%) of their maximum Health.

If all living allies are already marked, Ryze instead resurrects a deceased ally.

Ryze cannot resurrect himself.
TFT9_BelVeth_desc: Lash out at the lowest Health enemy in range <TFTBonus>6/6/30 (%i:scaleAS%)</TFTBonus> times. Each lash deals <physicalDamage>80/120/185 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and <trueDamage>2%</trueDamage> of the target's max Health as true damage.
TFT9_BelVeth_details_1: Total Number of Lashes: <TFTBonus>6</TFTBonus> = <scaleLevel>6</scaleLevel> + 6 per 100%  bonus %i:scaleAS%
TFT9_Jhin_desc:
Take aim at the current target and deal 462/693/1039 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies in a line; each hit reduces damage by 40%.

Ionia Bonus: +30% Attack Damage
TFT9_Poppy_desc:
Gain 290/310/330/350 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 3 seconds. Deal 140/210/315/315 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target.

4-Star Upgrade: Knock the target into the largest clump of enemies, dealing 33% of the target's max Health as magic damage to the target and 15% of that amount to the clump. Stun them for 1 seconds.
TFT9_Katarina_desc:
Throw three daggers that land next to enemies within 2 (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Then, teleport to each and deal 145/220/360 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and Wound them for 6 seconds.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
TFT9_Karma_desc:
Fire a burst of energy that explodes upon impact, dealing 155/230/390 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies. Every third cast launches 3 bursts.

Ionia Bonus: +30 Ability Power
TFT9_KSante_desc:
Knock up the current target before smashing them to the edge of the battlefield. Deal
250/400/1000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stun them for 2/3/10 seconds. Deal 250/400/1000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies the target collides with and Stun them for 1/1/5 second.

If the target can't be pushed back any further, knock them off the battlefield. Otherwise, K'Sante will chase after them.
TFT9_Nasus_desc:
Steal 5/5/15% maximum Health, 10% Attack Damage, 5/5/30 Armor, and 5/5/30 Magic Resist from the nearest 4/5/9 enemies for 8 (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.

While empowered, every third attack deals 210/315/945 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
TFT9_ChoGath_desc: Deal <magicDamage>320/461/677 (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the lowest Health enemy in range. If this kills them, devour them and permanently gain <scaleHealth>30</scaleHealth> maximum Health.
TFT9_Orianna_desc:
Grant the lowest Health ally 225/250/275 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. When the Shield expires, it deals 180/270/405 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and Chills them for 3 seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
TFT9_Sona_desc: Send a wave of sound at the largest clump of enemies and deal <magicDamage>115/175/285 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies hit. Allies hit by the wave gain <TFTBonus>25/30/40%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for 5 seconds.
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_SelfRepair_desc:
When the Apex Turret would die, it instead becomes untargetable and repairs itself if Heimerdinger is still alive.

Additional counts of this upgrade increase the repair speed.
TFT9_Shen_desc:
Gain 350/450/2000 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield and grant 250/350/1500 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield to the 2 lowest-Health allies for 4 seconds. After shielding his allies, Shen's Shield refreshes with a burst, dealing 225/355/1600 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies.

Ionia Bonus: +10% Damage Reduction
TFT9_Soraka_desc:
Heal the lowest health ally for 200/225/250 (%i:scaleAP%). If the ally is below 50% Health, heal them for an additional 100/113/125 (%i:scaleAP%).

Over the next 5 seconds, 5 stars hit the enemy closest to them. Each deals 100/150/235 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
TFT9_RyzeShurima_desc:
Create a portal to Shurima, summoning a sand tornado that travels across the battlefield, dealing 150/225/2000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit and knocking them up, Stunning them for 1/1/3 second.

The tornado has a chance to unearth buried treasures and gold as it travels.
TFT9_Malzahar_desc: Open two portals near the current target. Destroy 35% of Shields and deal <magicDamage>175/260/395 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all enemies caught between the portals.
TFT9_Aphelios_desc:
Fire a moon blast at the largest group of enemies that deals 120/180/743 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

For 7 seconds, equip 3 Chakram, plus 1 more for each enemy hit by the blast. Attacks deal 6/9/54 (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage for each Chakram equipped. Aphelios heals for 50% (%i:scaleAP%) of damage dealt by Chakrams.
TFT9_Aatrox_desc:
Transform for 10/10/30 seconds, gaining 15% (%i:scaleAP%) Omnivamp. While transformed, attacks deal 201/301/4501 (%i:scaleAS%%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt
TFT9_RyzeZaun_desc:
Create 3/6/25 portals to Zaun, causing hired guns to fire at nearby enemies. Deals 155/230/2006 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Wounds, 40% Shreds, and 40% Sunders for 6 seconds. The more gold you have, the more powerful the portals become.

25 Gold: +1 portal. Portals fire a rocket that deals 50% damage in a one-hex radius.
50 Gold: Double the portals. Summon 1 additional portals for every 15 Gold more.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 50%
Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
TFT9_Cassiopeia_desc:
Deal 200/300/450 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the current target and Wound them for 5 seconds. If they are already Wounded, deal 60/90/135 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
TFT9_Garen_desc: Spin <TFTBonus>2 (%i:scaleAS%)</TFTBonus> times every second for the next <TFTBonus>4 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> seconds. Each spin deals <physicalDamage>49/79/126 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to adjacent enemies.
TFT9_RyzePiltover_desc: Create a portal to Piltover that launches an enforcer grenade towards the largest clump of enemies, dealing <magicDamage>250/375/1999 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within two hexes and creating a containment area for <scaleLevel>3/4/8</scaleLevel> seconds. Enemies are unable to leave the area, and <scaleLevel>12/15/500%</scaleLevel> of the damage dealt to them is also dealt to all other enemies within.
TFT9_Ekko_desc: Heal <scaleHealth>30%</scaleHealth> of damage taken in the last 4 seconds and deal <magicDamage>290/435/710 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target.
TFT9_Jinx_desc: Fire 5 rockets at random enemies within 2 hexes of the current target. Each rocket deals <physicalDamage>83/125/198 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
TFT9_Teemo_desc:
Hurl an explosive heat-seeking mushroom at the current target. When it detonates, enemies within 1 hex are Wounded and dealt 210/315/485/485 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over 3 seconds.

4-Star Upgrade: Increase the explosion radius by 1 hex.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
TFT9_Tristana_desc:
Gain 70% (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed for 4 seconds. For the duration, attacks explode on impact and deal 27/41/61/81 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.

4-Star Upgrade: Every 8th attack deals 45/68/101/135 (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage and ricochets to the largest clump of enemies, dealing 23/34/51/68 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.
TFT9_JarvanIV_desc: Leap on a nearby enemy. Deal <magicDamage>140/210/800 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them for <scaleLevel>2/2/8</scaleLevel> seconds.
TFT9_Lissandra_desc: Stun the current target for 2 seconds and deal <magicDamage>160/240/400 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes of them. They take 10% more damage for the next 4 seconds.
TFT9_Ryze_desc: Create a portal to Bandle City under a random unit on your bench. They are summoned to the battlefield with @ModifiedBonusMana@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus Mana and are...slightly smaller?
TFT9_Zeri_desc:
Passive: Execute enemies below 12% (%i:scaleAP%) Health.

Active: For the next 5 seconds, attacks chain lightning to 3/3/5 additional enemies, dealing
39/59/135 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Kills reset this duration.
TFT9_Ashe_desc:
Fire 8 arrows in a cone, each dealing 55/83/124 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the first enemy hit and Chilling them for 2 (%i:scaleAP%) seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
TFT9_Ahri_desc:
Steal essence from enemies around the current target, dealing 115/170/1000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Mana Reaving them.

Every 3/3/1 casts, unleash a wave that deals 250/375/3000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies hit. This deals 33% more damage to enemies whose essence has been stolen.

Ionia Bonus: +3 Mana per second

Mana Reave: Increase max Mana by 35% until the next cast
TFT9_Maokai_desc:
Passive: Whenever an enemy uses their Ability, gain 5 Mana.

Active: On next attack, heal for 220/260/300 (%i:scaleAP%).
TFT9_RyzeBandleCity_desc: Create a portal to Bandle City under a random unit on your bench. They are summoned to the battlefield with 25/40/200 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus Mana and are...slightly smaller?
TFT9_Gwen_desc:
Dash around the current target and snip 3 times in a cone, each dealing 95/140/400 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit.

Every 3 casts, gain 120/120/300 Armor and Magic Resist for 2/3/4 seconds.
TFT9_Swain_desc: Transform and gain <scaleHealth>425/450/480 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> max Health for 6 seconds. While transformed, deal <magicDamage>25/40/60 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes every second.
TFT9_Azir_desc:
Passive: Every third attack, a Sand Soldier deals 95/140/500 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to their target.

Active: Summon a Sand Soldier to attack your target. If Azir already has 3 Soldiers, they all immediately deal 67/98/350 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.
TFT9_Zed_desc:
Create a shadow at the furthest enemy within 3 (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Zed and his shadow slash adjacent enemies, dealing 109/166/263 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

Ionia Bonus: +15% Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage
TFT9_Kassadin_desc:
Gain 250/300/400 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 150/225/325 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies in a cone and Disarm them for 2 seconds.

Disarm: Cannot move or attack, but CAN cast spells
TFT9_RyzeFreljord_desc:
Create a portal to the Freljord under a random group of enemies for 3 seconds. The freezing winds deal 300/450/2000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within two hexes over the duration and apply Permafrost, a permanent Chill.

If enemies are already affected by Permafrost, they are instead Stunned for the duration.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
TFT9_Senna_desc: Fire a massive beam at the furthest enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>124/195/2925 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to all enemies hit. Any allies hit gain <TFTBonus>250/325/4000 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 4/4/15 seconds.
TFT9_Darius_desc: Deal <physicalDamage>345/488/701 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the current target. If they die, immediately cast this again with <scaleLevel>82/85/90%</scaleLevel> damage.
TFT9_Kalista_desc:
Passive: Attacks impale a spear in the target, which deals 16/24/40 (%i:scaleAP%) true damage when removed. Kalista rips the spears out if it would kill the target.

Active: Impale 6 spears in the current target.
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_MicroRockets_desc:
Fire rockets in a wide cone every 3 attacks. Rockets deal magic damage, Burn, and Wound.

Additional counts of this upgrade increase the magic damage and Burn amount.

Burn: Deal a percentage of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduce healing received
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_ShrinkRay_desc:
Shrink enemies when dealing damage, Shredding and Sundering them.

Additional counts of this upgrade increase the Shred and Sunder.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
TFT9_Jayce_desc: Grant <TFTBonus>20/25/30% (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Attack Speed to Jayce and allies on his left and right for 3 seconds. Fire a blast at the current target that explodes on the first enemy hit. It deals <physicalDamage>156/234/366 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies near the blast.
TFT9_Viego_desc: Deal <magicDamage>125/185/280 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the current target. For the rest of combat, Viego's attacks deal <magicDamage>20/30/45 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus stacking magic damage.
TFT9_Akshan_desc:
Lock on to the farthest enemy and unleash a hail of 6 shots toward them. Each deals
101/157/243 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the first enemy hit.
TFT9_Warwick_desc:
Passive: Attacks heal for 25/30/35 (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: Increase the Passive healing by 50% for 3 seconds. Then, Stun adjacent enemies for 1/2/2 seconds.
TFT9_VelKoz_desc: Fire a plasma bolt towards the current target that deals <magicDamage>210/315/520 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the first enemy hit. It then splits in two, dealing 50% less damage whenever it passes through an enemy.
TFT9_Vi_desc:
Gain 325/350/400 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 120/180/270 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 1 hex of the current target and 40% Sunder them for 4 seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
TFT9_Renekton_desc: Deal <magicDamage>180/270/400 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies. Heal <scaleHealth>220/270/320 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> for the first enemy hit and another <scaleHealth>30 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> for each additional one.
TFT9_RekSai_desc:
Deal 195/293/461 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to the current target. If they are below 60% Health, deal
234/351/553 (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) true damage instead.

If this kills the target, rip through them 1 hex and heal for 120/216/389 (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%).
TFT9_Taliyah_desc:
Passive: Whenever an enemy is knocked up or back by anything, throw a boulder towards them. It deals 125/190/300 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

Active: Deal 160/240/375 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to your target and knock them up, Stunning them for 2 seconds.
TFT9_Galio_desc: Reduce damage taken by 20% and heal for <scaleHealth>275/300/325 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> over 4 seconds. After, deal <magicDamage>200/300/450 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
TFT9_Sett_desc:
Grab an enemy from either side and slam them together, knocking them up. Deals 200/300/465 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stuns them for 1/2/2 seconds.

If only one enemy is grabbed, the damage and Stun duration are increased by 50%.

Ionia Bonus: +180 maximum Health
TFT9_KaiSa_desc: Dash away from all enemies, then fire <scaleLevel>15/15/25</scaleLevel> missiles split across the 4 nearest enemies. Each missile deals <magicDamage>75/111/300 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
TFT9_HeimerUpgrade_Goldification_desc:
Executes low-Health enemies and turns them into gold.

Additional counts of this upgrade increase the amount of gold dropped.
TFT9_Samira_desc: Shoot at the current target and deal <physicalDamage>100/150/225 (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> to the first enemy hit. Reduce their Armor by <TFTBonus>20/25/30 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> for the rest of combat.
TFT9_THex_desc:
T-Hex is still powering up and has no Ability. Once she reaches @PowerRequirement@ Power, gain Hextech Breath.

Hextech Breath: Unleash a huge laser dealing magic damage.
TFT9_Urgot_desc:
Passive: Whenever an enemy enters Attack Range, fire a blast from the leg facing that direction that deals 256/384/964 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Each of Urgot's 6 legs has a 4/4/1 second cooldown.

Active: Gain 400/500/1200 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 5 seconds and dash behind the current target. Reset all leg cooldowns.
TFT9_Irelia_desc:
Enter a defensive stance and gain 350/400/450 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield that rapidly decays over 3 seconds. When it expires, deal 70/100/150 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage + 30% of the damage absorbed to enemies around and in front of Irelia.

Ionia Bonus: +40 Armor and Magic Resist
TFT9_VoidRemora_desc: Gain <TFTBonus>200 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 2 seconds. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>125 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
TFT9_Taric_desc: Gain <TFTBonus>400/475/550 (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for 6 seconds. It absorbs damage received by adjacent allies.
TFT9_Sejuani_desc:
Passive: Whenever an ally attacks a Chilled enemy, they deal 15/27/162 (%i:scaleHealth%) bonus true damage.

Active: Gain 600/700/2000 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for 4 seconds. Deal 150/225/1000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to nearby enemies and Chill them for 4 seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 30%
TFT9_Lux_desc: Channel a barrage of light at the current target that deals <magicDamage>750/1125/3333 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over <scaleLevel>3</scaleLevel> seconds, reducing their Magic Resist by <scaleLevel>15/15/50</scaleLevel> every second. If they die, shift to a new target.
TFT9_HeimerdingerTurret_desc: Fire a laser beam at the current target. Deal <magicDamage>185/275/4000 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies it passes through.
TFT9_RiftHerald_desc: Charge toward the furthest enemy and crash into the first enemy hit. Deal <magicDamage>180 (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies adjacent to the impact and Stun them for 2 seconds.
TFT9_BaronNashor_desc:
Passive: Cast every 2 attacks and cycle between 3 different Abilities: this, Voracious Bite (damage an enemy and heal), and Void Tentacle (damage and Stun a group).

Active: Lob three pools of acid towards the largest group of enemies, dealing 175 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and 60% Shredding and Sundering for 4 seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
Sunder: Reduce Armor
TFT9_RyzeTargon_desc:
Create a portal to the skies above Mount Targon that beckons the current target. After a few seconds, they descend from the heavens as a meteor towards the largest group of enemies, dealing 15/20/100% (%i:scaleAP%) of the the initial target's maximum Health as magic damage and knocking up enemies in the epicenter, Stunning them for 2/2/15 seconds.

If the target is the only enemy remaining, they never descend.
TFT9_Heimerdinger_desc:
Hurl a grenade towards the largest group of enemies, dealing 150/225/3141 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies in a large area and Stunning them for 2/2/15 seconds.

4-Star Upgrade: YES YES YES, IT WORKS!!!
TFT9_Kled_desc:
Passive: Start combat with 220/396/713/1030 (%i:scaleHealth%) Shield. When it expires, dismount and gain 60/65/70/75% (%i:scaleAP%) stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

Active: Remount and gain 220/396/713/1030 (%i:scaleHealth%) Shield.

4-Star Upgrade: Execute enemies under 25% Health.
TFT9_RyzeNoxus_desc:
Create a portal to Noxus that spews out a torrent of weapons and armor, granting 3/4/10 completed items to random allies with open slots, and throwing 4/5/12 axes towards random enemies that deal 150/225/2000 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each.

If an ally would recieve an item while all slots are full, they instead gain a stacking 10% damage increase for the rest of combat.
TFT9_Kayle_desc:
Passive: Gains new Passive effects as your Tactician levels up.
Level 1: Attacks deal 28/40/60 (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.
Level 6: Every 3rd attack launches a wave that deals 28/40/60 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and 40% Shreds enemies for 3 seconds.
Level 9: Every attack launches a wave and they travel farther.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
TFT9_Sion_desc:
Passive: Upon death, reanimate with 100% Health, decaying at 12/8/0% maximum Health per second. Sion can no longer use his Ability, but is immune to crowd control and gains
2/2/10 (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed.

Active: Charge towards the most enemies within 4 (%i:scaleRange%) hexes. Deal 158/247/788 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to any enemies along the way and knock them up, Stunning them for 1/2/15 seconds.
TFT9_RyzeDemacia_desc:
Create a portal to Demacia that protects allies for 2/2/5 seconds. Allies within the zone gain 720/1080/9999 (%i:scaleAP%) Shield. If an ally leaves the safety of the portal, they are healed for 250/375/9999 (%i:scaleAP%).

When the portal expires, enemies within are dealt 250/375/999 (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
TFT9_RyzeIonia_desc: Create a portal to Ionia in the center of the battlefield, summoning forth a Spirit Tree that affects the <scaleLevel>5/7/20</scaleLevel> closest units. Allies gain <TFTBonus>50/60/300%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for 6 seconds and are healed for <scaleHealth>400/600/3000 (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> over the duration. Enemies dance, Stunning them for <scaleLevel>2/3/20</scaleLevel> seconds.
TFT9_Yasuo_desc:
Send a whirlwind at the furthest enemy within 3 (%i:scaleRange%) hexes, knocking up and Stunning all enemies hit. Dash to and slash the original target, dealing 425/638/2831 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to them. Slam them into the ground and deal 225/338/1266 (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within 1 hex.

Ionia Bonus: +15% Omnivamp

Omnivamp: Heal for percentage of damage dealt
